name: Computer Networks
description: A computer network is a set of computers sharing resources located on or provided by network nodes.

name: Machine Learning
description: The subject will make students learn about the concept of computer algorithms that can automatically work and adapt to changes through the use of data.

name: Data Mining
description: The subject provides an insight into various concepts, including techniques and algorithms in data mining and warehousing and their applications.

name: Network Programming
description: The subject provides knowledge about network programming concepts in the UNIX environment.

name: Operating System
description: An operating system (OS) is system software that manages computer hardware, software resources, and provides common services for computer program

name: Bio-Informatics
description: This subject teaches students about algorithms, data structures, and areas of application in bioinformatics.
